Header: 11 Division Troops Help Feast of New Harvest
Content: Army troops serving Battalions, Training Schools and Units in the 111 Brigade of the 11 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) on the directions of the Major General Rukmal Dias, Commander, Security Forces - Central recently provided cooked meals and facilitated the conduct of ‘Aluth Sahal Mangallaya’ (feast for new rice harvest) at the sacred Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy. Under the supervision of the Major General T.J Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division, the troops provided cooked meals to hundreds of farmers and other attendees who brought their new harvest for the age-old rituals.
